title: P2P Agent Information (request)
description: Retrieve information about a P2P agent

agent_id.description: [Optional] The unique identifier for this agent. If not provided, returns agent information about the current account.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
